dataTypeConfigs.name: Property Details
dataTypeConfigs.description: Basic property information and characteristics including bedrooms, bathrooms, and building details

dataTypeConfigs.name: Land Characteristics
dataTypeConfigs.description: Lot size, dimensions, and land features

dataTypeConfigs.name: Legal Description
dataTypeConfigs.description: Legal property identification including lot, block, plan, and roll numbers

dataTypeConfigs.name: Valuation
dataTypeConfigs.description: Property valuation and AVM (Automated Valuation Model) data

dataTypeConfigs.name: Property Registry
dataTypeConfigs.description: Property registration, title, and ownership information

dataTypeConfigs.name: Mortgage Data
dataTypeConfigs.description: Mortgage statement, balance, and payment information

dataTypeConfigs.name: Identity Verification
dataTypeConfigs.description: Verified identity information from identity providers

dataTypeConfigs.name: Personal Identity
dataTypeConfigs.description: Core personal identity attributes including name, DOB, and address

dataTypeConfigs.name: Age Claims
dataTypeConfigs.description: Age verification claims for age-restricted services

dataTypeConfigs.name: Employment
dataTypeConfigs.description: Employment status, employer details, and income verification

dataTypeConfigs.name: Insurance
dataTypeConfigs.description: Insurance policy information including home and title insurance

dataTypeConfigs.name: Tax Information
dataTypeConfigs.description: Property tax and municipal assessment data

dataTypeConfigs.name: Strata Information
dataTypeConfigs.description: Strata/condo corporation details, fees, and documents
